name: Reazura: Gem Tides
description:
The world of Reazura has lived in harmony for many years... Until the looming Darkness kept under the lock and key of the Gem Guardians begins to escape.

Help the heroes of Reazura reclaim the Ultima Arms and lock down the Darkness like the Gem Guardians of old. May the Guardians bless your travels!

Cover Art done by: Todd "ConWire9"
